2. `nvim --clean -u minimal.lua`
3. press `:mes<cr>`
4. press `<c-y>` `<c-e>` several times
5. the color of the error message is flickering

### Expected behavior

The color of error message should always be red and not flicker

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.12.0-dev-303+g627c648252

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

6.14.4-arch1-1

### Terminal name/version

st 0.8.5

### $TERM environment variable

st-256color

### Installation

AUR
